column6: the Office of Investigation and Implementation of Immigration Planning Procedures of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police received 2 foreigners from Tuol Kork District
column7: for illegal residence without a passport/visa:------1. AHAMEFULA EKEZIE STAN
column10: a Nigerian (without passport/visa). This person entered the Kingdom of Cambodia in January 2020 through the Phnom Penh International Airport (first entry into the Kingdom of Cambodia). Has been a football player for 2 months and is currently unemployed.------2.  MBANZE CRISTIANO SALOMAO
column13: from Mozambique. (Residence visa expired on 11.10.2018). This person came to the Kingdom of Cambodia on 11 August. 2018 at Phnom Penh International Airport
column21: the Administration Police Force of Tuol Kork District Police Inspectorate arrested the 2 foreigners for staying illegally at a house in Sangkat Teuk Laak I
column24: the force sent them for medical examinations for COVID-19  with a negative result
column25: and they were sent to the Investigation and Enforcement Department of the General Department of Immigration to carry out further procedures. ------SOURCE
